page.title: 18PET SURVEY LOWER HEATH
page.content: We took a survey of pets from 33 families in our school.Here is a list of the results, 51% have got{Cats, 70% have got{Dogs, 7% have got{Guinea Pigs, 4% have got{Hamsters, 4% have got{Gerbils, 18% have got{Rabbits, 4% have got{Horses, 10% have got{Ponies, 51% for people with any other pets, 4% have{no pets}at all, The{average money}that is spent on their pets a month is Â£12.83p.The least amount of money spent on their pets a month was 20p.The most amount of money spent on their pets a month was Â£20.00p.The Horses and Ponies are the most expensive animals.The Gerbil is the least expensive animal.
